entries.title: Giving the world a pluggable Gnutella

title_detail.value: Giving the world a pluggable Gnutella

entries.summary: WorldOS is a framework on which to build programs that work like Freenet or Gnutella -allowing distributed applications using peer-to-peer routing.

summary_detail.value: WorldOS is a framework on which to build programs that work like Freenet or Gnutella -allowing distributed applications using peer-to-peer routing.

entries.title: Syndication discussions hot up
entries.summary: After a period of dormancy, the Syndication mailing list has become active again, with contributions from leaders in traditional media and Web syndication.

summary_detail.value: After a period of dormancy, the Syndication mailing list has become active again, with contributions from leaders in traditional media and Web syndication.

entries.title: Personal web server integrates file sharing and messaging

title_detail.value: Personal web server integrates file sharing and messaging

entries.summary: The Magi Project is an innovative project to create a combined personal web server and messaging system that enables the sharing and synchronization of information across desktop, laptop and palmtop devices.

summary_detail.value: The Magi Project is an innovative project to create a combined personal web server and messaging system that enables the sharing and synchronization of information across desktop, laptop and palmtop devices.

entries.title: Syndication and Metadata
entries.summary: RSS is probably the best known metadata format around. RDF is probably one of the least understood. In this essay, published on my O'Reilly Network weblog, I argue that the next generation of RSS should be based on RDF.

summary_detail.value: RSS is probably the best known metadata format around. RDF is probably one of the least understood. In this essay, published on my O'Reilly Network weblog, I argue that the next generation of RSS should be based on RDF.

entries.title: UK bloggers get organised
entries.summary: Looks like the weblogs scene is gathering pace beyond the shores of the US. There's now a UK-specific page on weblogs.com, and a mailing list at egroups.

summary_detail.value: Looks like the weblogs scene is gathering pace beyond the shores of the US. There's now a UK-specific page on weblogs.com, and a mailing list at egroups.

entries.title: Yournamehere.com more important than anything
entries.summary: Whatever you're publishing on the web, your site name is the most valuable asset you have, according to Carl Steadman.

summary_detail.value: Whatever you're publishing on the web, your site name is the most valuable asset you have, according to Carl Steadman.
